hero.title: OpenSource Kernel for AI-Driven Labs
hero.description: ScienceOL is building the open-source operating system for the future of automated, AI-powered scientific research. Build, automate, and collaborate.

about.title: Bridging Digital and Physical Laboratories
about.description: Our dual-function platform democratizes access to scientific tools. Science Online provides virtual laboratories and cloud computing, while OpenLab sets open-source standards for modular, automated hardware. Together, they create a seamless ecosystem for modern research.

chat.subtitle: Community Driven
chat.title: A Global Hub for Scientific Collaboration
chat.description: Join a vibrant community of scientists, engineers, and innovators. Share reproducible workflows, discover new ideas, and connect with experts to accelerate your research from concept to discovery.

discover.name: Share & Discover Workflows
discover.description: Access a growing library of community-contributed workflows for various scientific domains.

connect.name: Connect with Experts
connect.description: Engage with peers and leading researchers to solve complex challenges together.

accelerate.name: Accelerate Research
accelerate.description: Leverage collective knowledge and pre-built modules to avoid reinventing the wheel.

server.subtitle: Automated & Intelligent
server.title: The Future of Automated Discovery
server.description: Empower your lab with our open-source framework for robotics, AI, and data management. Build a fully autonomous, self-driving laboratory that accelerates the pace of discovery.

robotics.name: Robotic Integration
robotics.description: Seamlessly connect and control a wide range of laboratory hardware and robotic systems.

ai.name: AI-Powered Decisions
ai.description: Leverage AI agents to design experiments, analyze data, and decide the next steps autonomously.

data.name: Unified Data Management
data.description: Capture, process, and analyze experimental data in a structured and reproducible way.

digital-twin.name: Digital Twin
digital-twin.description: Simulate and optimize experiments in a virtual environment before running them in the real world.

remote.name: Remote Lab Access
remote.description: Monitor and control your experiments from anywhere in the world.

modular.name: Modular & Scalable
modular.description: Start small and scale up. Our modular design adapts to the needs of any laboratory.

studio.name: Studio
studio.description: The portal to all ScienceOL services and community.

protium.name: PROTIUM
protium.description: AI-native workflow engine for scientific computing.

xyzen.name: Xyzen
xyzen.description: The specialized agent for laboratory scenarios.

anti.name: Anti
anti.description: 3D digital twin platform for laboratory simulation.

labos.name: Lab-OS
labos.description: Open-source OS for modular lab hardware.

article.intro: Reimagining scientific research through virtual access and open standards.

description.13: Welcome to our online chatroom! Join us for an exciting discussion on space exploration. Explore topics like spacecraft technology and the search for extraterrestrial life with our panel of experts and enthusiasts.
